alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 08 at 3:20AM PST until December 08 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, areas of north to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the High Wind Warning, northeast winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Interstate 5 Corridor. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM PST this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain indoors and avoid windows. Use extra caution if you must drive.
